DOC.brief_summary: The propose study design develop test effectiveness novel web-based HIV intervention motivate HIV test among men sex men ( MSM ) . The intervention arm include delivery video tailor reason MSM get test HIV , well HIV test motivational message send via mobile-phone text messaging , e-mail instant messaging . The intervention assessment guide Information-Motivation-Behavioral skill model , Health Belief Model Stages Change theory . The control intervention health promotion message ( similar content Peruvian websites ) invitation free HIV testing . Testing offer Via Libre Epicentro clinic , mobile unit whose location determine base participant ' demand . The outcome evaluate intention get test actual HIV testing among MSM trial arm .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect Novel Web-based Intervention Increase HIV Testing Men Who Have Sex With Men
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old , man report sex man within last 12 month , resident metropolitan Lima , Peru , test HIV within last 12 month , valid email address , report HIV positive . Do meet inclusion criterion specify
